title: Ep. 1026 - Some People Just Want To Watch The World Burn
description:
The triple-vaccinated prime minister of Canada catches COVID for the second time this year, a new study shows that “transgender affirmation” raises the risk of suicide in young people, and squish Republicans sell conservatives’ Second Amendment rights down the river.

Join us tonight at 9pm ET for the world premiere of our Summer blockbuster “Terror on the Prairie”: https://utm.io/ueFOe  
 
Watch Matt Walsh’s new Daily Wire original documentary “What Is A Woman?” at whatisawoman.com, and pick up your copy of the “What Is A Woman?” book here: https://utm.io/ueFMe.  

Join Michael and the Daily Wire for Backstage Live At The Ryman on June 29th. Get your tickets now: https://utm.io/uezFr

—
